00038 template<typename Incrementable,
00039          // XXX TODO figure out whether we need CategoryOrTraversal
00040          // XXX TODO infer Difference type automatically
00041          typename Difference>
00042   class counting_iterator
00043     : public iterator_adaptor<counting_iterator<Incrementable,Difference>,
00044                               Incrementable,
00045                               Incrementable,
00046                               // XXX TODO infer the category automatically
00047                               thrust::experimental::random_access_universal_iterator_tag,
00048                               Incrementable const &,
00049                               Incrementable *,
00050                               Difference>
00051 {
00052     friend class iterator_core_access;
00053 
00054     typedef iterator_adaptor<counting_iterator<Incrementable,Difference>,
00055                              Incrementable,
00056                              Incrementable,
00057                              // XXX TODO infer the category automatically
00058                              thrust::experimental::random_access_universal_iterator_tag,
00059                              Incrementable const &,
00060                              Incrementable *,
00061                              Difference> super_t;
00062 
00063 
00064   public:
00065     typedef Incrementable const & reference;
00066 
00067     __host__ __device__
00068     counting_iterator(void){};
00069 
00070     // XXX nvcc can't compile this at the moment
00071     //__host__ __device__
00072     //counting_iterator(counting_iterator const &rhs):super_t(rhs.base()){}
00073 
00074     __host__ __device__
00075     explicit counting_iterator(Incrementable x):super_t(x){}
00076 
00077   private:
00078     __host__ __device__
00079     reference dereference(void) const
00080     {
00081       return this->base_reference();
00082     }
00083 }; // end counting_iterator
00084 
00085 // XXX TODO infer the Difference type automatically
00086 template <typename Incrementable, typename Difference>
00087 inline counting_iterator<Incrementable, Difference>
00088 make_counting_iterator(Incrementable x)
00089 {
00090   return counting_iterator<Incrementable, Difference>(x);
00091 }
00092 
00093 } // end experimental
